Hi! I'm Abhik Ahuja.

I’m an incoming M.Phil student studying Visual Computing at the University of Cambridge. I am particularly interested in problems related to 3D vision and computational photography. I recently graduated from UC Berkeley with a double major in Computer Science and Mathematics, where I worked with Professor Angjoo Kanazawa and Matthew Tancik on visual computing projects such as Nerfstudio. I have previously interned at Amazon, where I worked on backend infrastructure.

Aside from computer science, I am interested in origami, photography, Rubik’s cubes, vegan cooking, public transportation, mechanical keyboards, and more. Feel free to reach out if you want talk about any of those, or for any other reason!

You can contact me via email at ahujaabhik (at) proton (dot) me.
